title: DeepPlanning: Benchmarking Long-Horizon Agentic Planning with Verifiable Constraints
description: Benchmark for practical long-horizon agent planning with multi-day travel and multi-product shopping tasks requiring global constrained optimization.

title: Programming over Thinking: Efficient and Robust Multi-Constraint Planning
description: Proposes code generation over chain-of-thought for multi-constraint planning problems.

title: DeepPlanner: Scaling Planning Capability for Deep Research Agents via Advantage Shaping
description: Scales planning capabilities in deep research agents using advantage shaping in reinforcement learning.

title: TCP: A Benchmark for Temporal Constraint-Based Planning
description: Benchmark focused on planning under temporal constraints, published at EMNLP 2025.

title: TimeArena: Shaping Efficient Multitasking Language Agents in a Time-Aware Simulation
description: Time-aware simulation for evaluating multitasking efficiency in language agents (ACL 2024).

title: PlanBench: An Extensible Benchmark for Evaluating Large Language Models on Planning and Reasoning about Change
description: Extensible benchmark evaluating LLMs on classical planning and reasoning about state changes.

title: TourPlanner: A Competitive Consensus Framework with Constraint-Gated Reinforcement Learning for Travel Planning
description: Uses constraint-gated RL and multi-agent competition for travel planning.

title: TravelBench: A Broader Real-World Benchmark for Multi-Turn and Tool-Using Travel Planning
description: Multi-turn travel planning with 10 real-world tools, infeasible request handling, and sandbox evaluation.

title: TriFlow: A Progressive Multi-Agent Framework for Intelligent Trip Planning
description: Multi-agent framework with progressive refinement for trip planning.

title: TripScore: Benchmarking and Rewarding Real-World Travel Planning with Fine-Grained Evaluation
description: Unified scoring metric for travel plan quality with RL integration via GRPO.

title: TripTailor: A Real-World Benchmark for Personalized Travel Planning
description: Evaluates personalization and reasonableness of itineraries (ACL 2025 Findings).

title: ChinaTravel: An Open-Ended Benchmark for Language Agents in Chinese Travel Planning
description: Chinese travel planning benchmark with stricter constraints and DSL-based evaluation.

title: Personal Large Language Model Agents: A Case Study on Tailored Travel Planning
description: Case study on personalized travel planning with LLM agents (EMNLP 2024 Industry).

title: TravelPlanner: A Benchmark for Real-World Planning with Language Agents
description: First travel planning benchmark for LLM agents, featuring multi-day itinerary construction (ICML 2024).

title: LocalSearchBench: Benchmarking Agentic Search in Real-World Local Life Services
description: Evaluates agentic search for local services like restaurants and businesses.

title: DeepShop: A Benchmark for Deep Research Shopping Agents
description: Benchmark for shopping agents that must deeply research products before purchasing.

title: WebShop: Towards Scalable Real-World Web Interaction with Grounded Language Agents
description: Simulated e-commerce environment for grounded web interaction (NeurIPS 2022).

title: BrowseComp: A Simple Yet Challenging Benchmark for Browsing Agents
description: Challenging benchmark from OpenAI testing browsing agent capabilities.

title: WebVoyager: Building an End-to-End Web Agent with Large Multimodal Models
description: End-to-end web agent using multimodal models for real-world web tasks (ACL 2024).

title: WebArena: A Realistic Web Environment for Building Autonomous Agents
description: Self-hosted realistic web environment for end-to-end agent evaluation (ICLR 2024).

title: Mind2Web: Towards a Generalist Agent for the Web
description: Large-scale dataset for building generalist web agents across diverse websites (NeurIPS 2023).

title: ToolGym: An Open-World Tool-Using Environment for Scalable Agent Testing and Data Curation
description: Open-world environment for testing tool-using agents at scale.

title: ToolLLM: Facilitating Large Language Models to Master 16000+ Real-World APIs
description: Framework for training LLMs to use 16,000+ real-world APIs (ICLR 2024).

title: API-Bank: A Comprehensive Benchmark for Tool-Augmented LLMs
description: Benchmark for evaluating LLMs on API/tool usage (EMNLP 2023).

title: DeepSeek-v3.2: Pushing the Frontier of Open Large Language Models
description: DeepSeek's frontier open LLM.

title: GLM-4.5: Agentic, Reasoning, and Coding (ARC) Foundation Models
description: MoE model (355B params) strong on agentic benchmarks including TAU-Bench.

title: Kimi K2: Open Agentic Intelligence
description: Open-weight model focused on agentic intelligence from Moonshot AI.

title: Gemini 2.5: Pushing the Frontier with Advanced Reasoning, Multimodality, and Agentic Capabilities
description: Google's frontier model with next-generation agentic capabilities.

title: Qwen3 Technical Report
description: Technical report for the Qwen3 model family from Alibaba.

title: Seed1.5-Thinking: Advancing Superb Reasoning Models with Reinforcement Learning
description: ByteDance's reasoning model trained with RL for advanced reasoning tasks.

title: Evaluating the Consistency and Limit-Awareness of LLM Agents
description: Studies whether LLM agents know and respect their own limitations.

title: AgencyBench: Benchmarking the Frontiers of Autonomous Agents in 1M-Token Real-World Contexts
description: Evaluates autonomous agents handling million-token real-world contexts.

title: VitaBench: Benchmarking LLM Agents with Versatile Interactive Tasks in Real-World Applications
description: Versatile interactive task benchmark for LLM agents in real applications.

title: ARE: Scaling Up Agent Environments and Evaluations
description: Meta's framework for scaling agent environments and evaluation.

title: UserBench: An Interactive Gym Environment for User-Centric Agents
description: Interactive environment for evaluating user-centric agent behaviors.

title: pi2-Bench: Evaluating Conversational Agents in a Dual-Control Environment
description: Benchmark for conversational agents under dual-control conditions.

title: tau-bench: A Benchmark for Tool-Agent-User Interaction in Real-World Domains
description: Dynamic policy-guided benchmark for tool-agent-user interaction.

title: On the Self-Verification Limitations of Large Language Models on Reasoning and Planning Tasks
description: Demonstrates that LLMs struggle to verify their own reasoning and planning outputs (ICLR 2025).
